name: noted
description: ## Motivation If you search for a guitar note trainer on Google, the first result is the one by GuitarOrb.com. It's great, but it lacks some important features! Why can't I use a custom tuning? Why does it only let me identify the note of a given position on the fretboard, instead of letting me also locate a given note?  The other popular guitar note trainers lack these features too, so I made *Noted*!
